title: Apples in Tasmania
creator_credit: Cine Austral Productions and Fred Whatham
brief_description: Traces the development and locations of the apple-growing industry in Tasmania. Illustrates activities related to the planting, culture, harvesting and marketing of apples. Narrated by Roger Climpson. Suitable for Upper Primary-Upper Secondary students.
